idea-plugin.name: JiBX binder
idea-plugin.description:
Runs JiBX binding compiler after the javac compiler has run. Most of the hard work was done by Jerome Bernard (jerome.bernard@kalixia.com)

Automatically figures out what files are JiBX files by using a naive regex: ^.*/src/main/.*jibx/.*\.xml$
Then runs the JiBX binding compiler after a compile.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
1.0
            - Added auto detection of JiBX files based of a naive regex
            - JiBX compiler is run after compile
